# [FEAT] Side Conversations

## Labels
`collaboration`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement side conversations for reaching out to third parties (internal teams, vendors) from within a ticket.

## Requirements

### Side Conversation Types
- Email side conversations
- Slack side conversations
- Child tickets
- Internal discussions

### Features
- Create from ticket
- Separate thread from main ticket
- Include ticket context
- Track responses
- Merge back to ticket

### Email Side Conversations
- Send email to external parties
- Custom subject line
- Include attachments
- Track replies
- Thread management

### Slack Integration
- Send to Slack channel
- Send to Slack user
- Include ticket link
- Response tracking
- Two-way sync

### Child Tickets
- Create linked ticket
- Different assignee/group
- Track child status
- Link back to parent
- Resolution dependencies

### Visibility
- Visible to agents
- Hidden from requester
- Configurable visibility
- Audit trail

## Zendesk Reference
Side conversations allow agents to loop in external parties or internal teams without cluttering the main ticket thread.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Email side conversations work
- [ ] Responses tracked
- [ ] Slack integration functional
- [ ] Child tickets linked
- [ ] Visibility controls work
